alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 5:24AM AKDT until April 10 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with reduced visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. West winds gusting to 30 mph. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds are expected to increase this morning, with gusts to 30 mph late this morning continuing into the late afternoon. This is expected to cause low visibility in blowing snow from late this morning through late this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
